alert.note: Alert for Prince George (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 04 at 1:36PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Prince George County and the City of Petersburg through 200 PM EDT... At 136 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Petersburg, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Fort Lee around 145 PM EDT. Prince George around 155 PM EDT. Disputanta around 200 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include New Bohemia, Richard Bland College, Birchett Estate, Petersburg National Battlefield and Prince George Golf. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
